monitors.title: BenQ ZOWIE RL2455 24 inch Console e-Sports Monitor
monitors.description: Every detail of the RL-series is designed and fine-tuned for the exceptional console e-Sports experience. The ZOWIE RL-series has been adopted worldwide by most professional e-Sports tournaments and players. With your persistence and dedication to win backed by the exclusive features of the RL-series, you will be armed to compete in FPS, fighting or sports games on any console.

monitors.title: BenQ ZOWIE XL2411 144Hz 24 inch e-Sports Monitor
monitors.description: BenQ ZOWIE’s XL-series features the premiere e-Sports monitors for PC competitors, fine-tuned to guarantee the smoothest and responsive experience, and the clearest images to arm you for competition.

mousepads.title: BenQ ZOWIE G TF-X Mouse Pad for e-Sports
mousepads.description: The new edition of the TF series, TF-X brings together unique surface of the TF series and the new soft rubber base from the SR series. It has stitched edges and comes in two sizes: G TF-X (large) and P TF-X (small).

mousepads.title: BenQ ZOWIE P TF-X Mouse Pad for e-Sports
mousepads.description: The new edition of the TF series, TF-X brings together unique surface of the TF series and the new soft rubber base from the SR series. It has stitched edges and comes in two sizes: G TF-X (large) and P TF-X (small).

mousepads.title: BenQ ZOWIE G-SR Mouse Pad for e-Sports
mousepads.description: SR is the answer for gamers that enjoy the comfort of a soft rubber base in a cloth mousepad. The newly developed soft rubber base is 100% flat, providing comfort while maintaining a consistent glide across the mousepad to ensure the best performance is met. SR comes in two sizes: G-SR (large) and P-SR(small).

mousepads.title: BenQ ZOWIE G-SR+-SE Mouse Pad (HLTV Special Edition) for e-Sports
mousepads.description: SR-SE is the answer for gamers that enjoy the comfort of a soft rubber base in a cloth mousepad. The unique soft rubber base is 100% flat, providing comfort while maintaining a consistent glide across the mousepad to ensure the best performance is met. And its glide is different from G-SR black. SR-SE comes in two thickness: G-SR+-SE (5mm) and G-SR-SE (3.5mm).

mousepads.title: BenQ ZOWIE G-SR-SE Mouse Pad (HLTV Special Edition) for e-Sports
mousepads.description: SR-SE is the answer for gamers that enjoy the comfort of a soft rubber base in a cloth mousepad. The unique soft rubber base is 100% flat, providing comfort while maintaining a consistent glide across the mousepad to ensure the best performance is met. And its glide is different from G-SR black. SR-SE comes in two thickness: G-SR+-SE (5mm) and G-SR-SE (3.5mm).

mousepads.title: BenQ ZOWIE P-SR Mouse Pad for e-Sports
mousepads.description: SR is the answer for gamers that enjoy the comfort of a soft rubber base in a cloth mousepad. SR comes in two sizes: G-SR (large) and P-SR(small).

mouses.title: BenQ ZOWIE EC1-A Mouse for e-Sports
mouses.description: Ergonomic design exclusively for right-handed users. It offers users a bigger room for wrist movements. The shape of the right side of mouse is well rounded. It allows the user’s fingertips to hold/cover the mouse to move smoothly. EC Series comes in two sizes to fulfill different needs.

mouses.description: Ergonomic design exclusively for right-handed users. It offers users a bigger room for wrist movements. The shape of the right side of mouse is well rounded. mouses.title: BenQ ZOWIE FK1 Mouse for e-Sports
mouses.description: No matter whether you are right-handed or left-handed, FK Series are designed for your comfort. The low profile design provides better control for both claw and palm-grip users. FK Series comes in three different sizes.

mouses.title: BenQ ZOWIE ZA11 Mouse for e-Sports
mouses.description: Comfortable designed for both right-hand and left-hand users. The high profile design gives support to user’s palm. ZA Series comes in three different sizes.
